-Optimize for iOS 12.
-Solved problem some users could not buy F22A.
-F22 cockpit improved.
-Using gyro as pitch and roll input instead of acceleration meter, it's will have stabler input.
-Slight improvement of FCS.
-Small bugs fixed.

-All new rendering system, better performance, more realistic atmosphere rendering, real dusk effect.

-The touch control system was redesigned. Please read the Help document for instructions.
-Foggy option.
-Device orientation support Landscape right.
-Some bugs fixed.

-The touch control system was redesigned. Please read the Help document for instructions.
-Foggy option.
-Device orientation support Landscape right.
-Some bugs fixed.

-Increased the area of the throttle touch controller.
-The throttle mode and the speed brake operating area are swapped, making it easier to control the speed brake.
-Increased the sensitivity of double taps.
-Fixed several minor bugs.

-Finally, the gun sight of F-18 was correctly implemented. The Gun director considered the target acceleration to predict the impact point, and had high accuracy in the snapshot. It is assumed that the target does not have a large acceleration change duri

-Finally, the gun sight of F-18 was correctly implemented. The Gun director considered the target acceleration to predict the impact point, and had high accuracy in the snapshot. It is assumed that the target does not have a large acceleration change duri
